faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Get answers about our solutions
faq.q1: How long does it take to assemble a modular stand?
faq.a1: Assembly is extremely fast thanks to the click-in system. A standard 9m² stand can be assembled in less than 1 hour by 2 people, without the need for special tools.
faq.q2: How many times can I reuse the structures?
faq.a2: Smart Signage structures are designed for extreme durability. They can be reused at 10+ events without loss of visual or structural quality, maintaining professional photographic finish.
faq.q3: How does transportation and storage work?
faq.a3: Modules are compacted in special transport cases, reducing volume by up to 70%. This facilitates transportation, reduces shipping costs and allows storage in small spaces.
faq.q4: Can I adapt the design between events?
faq.a4: Yes! The modularity allows you to completely reconfigure the layout. You can create different formations, add or remove modules, and change graphics for each specific event.
faq.q5: Can Smart Signage withstand outdoor events?
faq.a5: The structures are developed in high-resistance aluminum and tensioned fabric with UV treatment. They are suitable for indoor and covered outdoor environments, but we recommend protection against direct rain.
faq.q6: What is the print quality compared to canvas or vinyl?
faq.a6: We use sublimation printing on special fabric that offers more vibrant colors, better resolution and premium finish. The result is superior to canvas or vinyl, with professional photographic appearance.
faq.q7: Do I need a specialized team to assemble?
faq.a7: No! The system is intuitive and can be assembled by anyone after quick training. We provide visual manuals and video support. We also offer optional assembly service.
faq.q8: Is Smart Signage more expensive than wooden stands?
faq.a8: The initial investment may be 30% higher, but positive ROI happens as early as the 2nd event. Over 3 years and 12 events, savings reach 70% compared to traditional disposable stands.
faq.a9: Yes! Our design team develops customized solutions combining different modules. We also create special modules for specific needs, maintaining system compatibility.
faq.a10: We offer 12 months warranty for manufacturing defects on the aluminum structure and 6 months for tensioned graphics. We also provide lifetime technical support and parts replacement.
